step1.sentence: Don't spill the beans about the surprise party — Amy has no idea it's happening.

step2.story: The whole office had kept the retirement party a secret for two weeks. Then Kevin accidentally spilled the beans in the elevator by asking if anyone had confirmed the cake order.

step3.story: Lily and her three best friends had planned the most elaborate birthday surprise for their roommate Jess. They booked a rooftop, hired Jess's favorite local band, and coordinated a fake errand to get her out of the apartment. The plan was flawless until Lily mentioned on a group video call that she was running late for the rooftop setup — not realizing Jess was visible in the background. Jess did not say a word, but she wore the biggest smile when she arrived.

meaning.realUsageKo: 의도치 않게 또는 실수로 비밀을 발설할 때 씁니다.
meaning.etymologyKo: 고대 그리스 투표에서 콩으로 찬반을 표시하던 비밀 항아리를 쏟으면 결과가 드러났던 데서 유래했다는 설이 있습니다.
meaning.nuanceKo: 실수나 부주의로 비밀이 새어나갈 때 쓰는 표현으로, 의도적 폭로보다는 실수에 더 잘 어울립니다.
meaning.shortExampleEn: He spilled the beans about the merger before the official announcement.
meaning.shortExampleKo: 그는 공식 발표 전에 합병 소식을 새어나가게 했어요.
